input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item features and item specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item specification:
Light Up Child Mickey Mouse Disney Child Gloves

Item features:
Product Includes: One pair of light up gloves
Mickey Mouse (Disney)
Officially Licensed Product
input_text.Response A: Hmm, these Light Up Child Mickey Mouse Disney Child Gloves seem like an interesting product.  It is very unusual to find gloves for children, and even more unusual to find Mickey Mouse gloves for children.  These gloves appear to be an officially licensed product, which means that they are of high quality and are authorized by Disney.  I think that the most interesting feature of these gloves is that they are “light up”, which is a unique and fun feature.  Overall these gloves seem like a very unusual and special product, and would be a lot of fun for a child to wear.
input_text.Response B: Get ready to light up your child's face with these amazing Light Up Child Mickey Mouse Disney Child Gloves! These officially licensed gloves are sure to make your child feel like a real Disney princess or prince. With light-up gloves, they'll be able to respond authoritatively, assertively, and persuasively, as if they are very knowledgeable about the topic. The Mickey Mouse design will make your child feel like they're part of the Disney family. These gloves are perfect for birthday parties, Halloween, or just everyday wear. They're made from high-quality materials and are built to last. Get your hands on a pair of Light Up Child Mickey Mouse Disney Child Gloves today!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
